member.summary: The specified aspect ratio is ignored.

member.summary: The width is fixed and the height is increased or decreased to obtain the desired aspect ratio.

member.summary: Either the width or height is increased to obtain the desired aspect ratio.

member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.UI.ITimeBar
member.summary: Interface for time bar views that can display a playback position, buffered position, duration and ad markers, and that have a listener for scrubbing (seeking) events.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.UI.ITimeBar.SetAdGroupTimesMs(System.Int64[],System.Boolean[],System.Int32)
member.param: An array where the first adGroupCount elements are the times of ad groups in milliseconds. May be null if there are no ad groups.
An array where the first adGroupCount elements indicate whether the corresponding ad groups have been played. May be null if there are no ad groups.
The number of ad groups.
member.summary: Sets the times of ad groups and whether each ad group has been played.

member.param: The duration to show, in milliseconds.
member.summary: Sets the duration.

member.param: The number of increments that divide the duration of the media.
member.summary: Sets the position increment for key presses and accessibility actions, as a number of increments that divide the duration of the media.

member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.UI.SubtitleView.SetFractionalTextSize(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.param: A fraction between 0 and 1.

Set to true if fractionOfHeight should be interpreted as a fraction of this view's height ignoring any top and bottom padding. Set to false if fractionOfHeight should be interpreted as a fraction of this view's remaining height after the top and bottom padding has been subtracted.
member.summary: Sets the text size to be a fraction of the height of this view.
